name: InstantBingoCard Document
summary: Learn about .IBCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The cells stored in IBCD files can contain custom embedded images placed by the user. The images can be auto-scaled or stretched to fit the target call item cell. Each image may also contain custom call item words.
InstantBingoCard is used by a variety of users, including parents, teachers, and party organizers.

description: Bingo card design created by InstantBingoCard, an application that allows user to create and print bingo cards; stores the card grid size and theme, as well as words and pictures for each call item on the card; supports multiple character sets, including Unicode; can be printed using any standard printer.
